ServiceDescription: This API accesses QLD Government wildlife data that has been approved for public release.  There are a number of functions that retrieve species profiles, notes, statuses, images and locations.

Functions.Name: Get Kingdom Names
Functions.Description: Lists all of the kingdom names.

Functions.Name: Get Class Names
Functions.Description: Lists all of the class names within a specified kingdom.

Functions.Name: Get Family Names
Functions.Description: Lists all of the class names within a specified class.

Functions.Name: Get Species
Functions.Description: Lists all of the species within a specified family.

Functions.Name: Get Species By Id
Functions.Description: Returns the species profile and notes for the specified taxon id ('taxonid').  Urls to images and maps are returned if they exist.

Functions.Name: Species Search
Functions.Description: Searches for species names by matching scientific and all recorded common names.  The search returns a match if the search string is found or if it sounds like a species name.

Functions.Name: Get Organisations
Functions.Description: Lists the organisation names (and associated ids) who have contributed data.

Functions.Name: Get Projects
Functions.Description: Lists the project names (and associated ids) that the data has been collected under.

Functions.Name: Get Projects By Id
Functions.Description: Lists a subset of the project names (and associated ids) that correspond to the project ids input.

Functions.Name: Get Projects Metadata By Id
Functions.Description: Lists a subset of the project metadata that correspond to the project ids input.

Functions.Name: Project Search
Functions.Description: Returns a list of projects that match (full or partial) the search string as specified by 'projtitle'.

Functions.Name: Get Sites
Functions.Description: Lists the site locations associated with a projects or projects as specified by 'projids'.

Functions.Name: Get Surveys
Functions.Description: Lists the surveys and their locations associated with a projects or projects as specified by 'projids'.

Functions.Name: Get Surveys By Species
Functions.Description: Lists the surveys and their locations associated with a species (scientific name) as specified by 'species'.

Functions.Name: Get Species List
Functions.Description: Lists all unique species found within a defined area.

Functions.Name: Get EPBC Statuses
Functions.Description: Lists all EPBC status codes and descriptions.

Functions.Name: Get NCA Statuses
Functions.Description: Lists all NCA status codes and descriptions.

Varaibles.Name: f
Varaibles.Description: Format - Setting the 'f' varaible will determine the format of the response.  There are 4 possible options; json, xml, kml and csv.  Json is the default if 'f' is not set.  If the output is spatial, GeoJson will be return for 'f=json' and KML will be returned for 'f=xml' or 'f=kml'.

Varaibles.Name: projids
Varaibles.Description: Project Ids - Comma separated list of project ids.

Varaibles.Name: projtitle
Varaibles.Description: Project Title - A title (full or partial) that is used as a search string to search for a project or projects.

Varaibles.Name: proj
Varaibles.Description: Include Porject Details - This indicates if the project details are to be included in the output.  The default is true.

Varaibles.Name: org
Varaibles.Description: Organisation ID - An ID that is associated with an organisation.

Varaibles.Name: bbox
Varaibles.Description: Bounding Box - A bounding box that defines a geographical area.  Specified as top left, bottom right, e.g. lat,lng,lat,lng.

Varaibles.Name: circle
Varaibles.Description: Circle - A circle (buffered point) that defines a geographical area.  Specifed as centre, radius(m), e.g. lat,lng,distance.

Varaibles.Name: pagecount
Varaibles.Description: Page Count - The number of records to return on a page.

Varaibles.Name: pageindex
Varaibles.Description: Page Index - The page index to return.

Varaibles.Name: p
Varaibles.Description: Location Precision - The distance in metres that indicates the accuracy of the records location.

Varaibles.Name: min
Varaibles.Description: Minimum Start Date - The earliest date for a record to be returned.

Varaibles.Name: max
Varaibles.Description: Maximum Start Date - The latest date for a record to be returned.

Varaibles.Name: classes
Varaibles.Description: Classes - A comma separated list of class scientific names.

Varaibles.Name: species
Varaibles.Description: Species Name - A scientific species name.

Varaibles.Name: taxonid
Varaibles.Description: Taxon ID - A unique id that identifies a particular species.
